content: Look out for the title of the page here, it describes the current page
Watch out for the connection info here, if its green with a check mark, it means your logs are streaming successfully. Otherwise please check the documentation on how to stream logs
Your chart is displayed here, the header is quite self explanatory
Bar charts will be displayed here, you can read your streams as it comes in
Filter tables by different groups or views, depends on your preference
Download the logs of your streams, use this filter to control the logs
This chart provides the logs in real time presented as pie chart
This table auto scrolls as logs are being presented to the user please watch out for the logs here
Controls navigation to other parts of the app
